activities: RMG Networks Holding Corporation, and its subsidiaries (collectively "RMG Networks"), provides hardware and software for digital signage.  While rare to receive end customer data from overseas, it could occur.  Additionally, we have employees in the EU (and other countries) and occasionally receive H/R-related PII regarding those employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information is collected via Website visits (via cookies) or, transmitted to us electronically by Customers under protection of a Non-Disclosure Agreement, or from our employees for personnel records.
recoursemech: In house.  Additionally, RMG Networks' employees / contractors in the EU and Switzerland may contact their local Data Protection Panel (EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner).
